alert.note: Alert for Meeker; Renville; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:47AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Wright, central Meeker, northwestern McLeod and northeastern Renville Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 747 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Stewart, or 8 miles southwest of Hutchinson, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hutchinson around 755 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Litchfield and Dassel. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 97 and 116. U.S. Highway 212 near mile marker 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
